script: Hey [Name], I’ve just jumped off training in my business and thought of you. When can I pinch 30 minutes of your time to run it by you? I’d love your thoughts.
Hi [Name], we’ve just had some insanely exciting changes in our business! When can I grab 30 minutes to show you what’s new? Might be even better for you now.
Hi [Name], thanks for supporting my post yesterday! I'm super close to my next promotion, and would love to catch up with you and show you what I do. Could we chat for 30 mins this week?
